column4: if you're strapped for space such on many wubi installs check for caches that might be outside your radar. in your home folder "du -h | grep [0-9]GB" can be interesting -- sometimes my imaps take up ridiculous amounts of space if i don't watch for example.
I already know where the lost space comes from.
I just have to introduce a symbolic link somewhere and move some data.
space is space, is all i mean.
